channel.title: Nokia N95 Error
channel.description:
i have the newer Nokia N95 (black 8gb edition), and the screen has recently stopped working.
[img]http://www.unwiredview.com/wp-content/uploads/2007/08/nokia-n95-8gb.jpg[/img]
[b]Top Left: Normal View Top Right: Keypad View Bottom: MediaKey View[/b]
the error is exactly this:
the screen powers on. it will work, if you leave it the screen will go off, now you cannot initialise the screen again unless you flip open the media keypad,
now this is telling me that there is a loose wire? that when it should goto the screensaver it just turns off the screen and then the media key fix just enables it again,
now my question is, does anyone have any idea how to fix it? i have looked on google but no positive results (from my searching anyway)
thanks, Ollie.

item.title: Nokia N95 Error
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

Yz85Racer:

…that’s an aweful lot to have a phone fixed…

yes, spesh when i can buy a new phone (not as good) for that price, or buy a stolen iPhone for cheaper

Read full topic

item.title: Nokia N95 Error
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:6, topic:251247”]the problem is that the phone is over a year old, i never said it was new

so the warrenty is no longer! i think i am going to dismantle it and have a play

p.s. i sent a support request to nokia, they said to send to them and get it fixed for £120[/quote]
…that’s an aweful lot to have a phone fixed…

Read full topic

item.title: Nokia N95 Error
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Probably some software failure or whatever: get a new one. You have one year warranty, you might aswell use it.

Read full topic

item.title: Nokia N95 Error
item.dc:creator: @sup000 sup000
item.description:
@sup000 wrote:

new phones have warranties for a reason.

i, today, had to exchange my storm due to software problems. uncaught exceptions being thrown on application start, phones 4u said, “i’ve never heard of a midlet constructor”. New phone no probs.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 20, 2008, 03:57:32 pm[/size][hr]meh. also check power saving options.

Read full topic

item.title: Nokia N95 Error
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

MOD MOD MOD!!!

Go on… I think you should try it, fire up the soldering iron, learn how to solder SMD’s, open it up void any warrenty potentally brake it but have a good go and learn something. =]

Read full topic

i have the newer Nokia N95 (black 8gb edition), and the screen has recently stopped working.

Bottom: MediaKey View

the error is exactly this:

it will work, if you leave it the screen will go off,
now you cannot initialise the screen again unless you flip open the media keypad,

now this is telling me that there is a loose wire? that when it should goto the screensaver it just turns off the screen and then the media key fix just enables it again,
